mapper.select: SELECT o.*, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.address FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id ORDER BY o.create_time DESC

SELECT o.*, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.address, oi.id as item_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.price FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id WHERE o.id = #{id}
SELECT o.*, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.address FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC
SELECT o.*, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.address FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id WHERE o.status = #{status} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC
SELECT o.*, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.address FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id ORDER BY o.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, total_amount, status, shipping_address, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{shippingAddress}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
